scripts.deploy-private: npm run types && ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.private npx hardhat run  --network theta_privatenet scripts/deploy.cjs
scripts.deploy-test: npm run types && ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.test npx hardhat run  --network theta_testnet scripts/deploy.cjs
scripts.upgradeable-private: npm run types && ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.private npx hardhat run  --network theta_privatenet scripts/deploy-upgradeable.cjs
scripts.upgradeable-test: npm run types && ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.test npx hardhat run  --network theta_testnet scripts/deploy-upgradeable.cjs
scripts.upgrade-private: npm run types && ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.private npx hardhat run  --network theta_privatenet scripts/upgrade.cjs
scripts.upgrade-test: npm run types && ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.test npx hardhat run  --network theta_testnet scripts/upgrade.cjs
